ygData.subject: Re: Memmed spells
ygData.msgSnippet: Whoa boy, you dont know what hags are :).  At level 23, 2 festering hag spells kill me.  Their spells do about 250 a pop or around there.  I ve seen them take
ygData.messageBody:
Whoa boy, you dont know what hags are :). At level 23, 2 festering hag
spells kill me. Their spells do about 250 a pop or around there. I've seen
them take down a 28 paladin in about 4 secs. You dont have the time to cast
gate. Yesterday, I was jumping off the roof in unrest as a quick way down,
and i LANDED on a hag. So of course the first thing i did was hit my hotkey
(see the use of it?) for divine, RIGHT before she finished casting. That
definately saved me. I ran like hell and made it to zone before she could
cast again (amen SOW).
Allsar Olath`Vlos - 23rd circle - The Rathe
-----Original Message-----
>True, I haven't fought hags before. If spells are what they use to kill
you
>though, then unless they are stun type spells, they wont interrupt your
>casting, and gate will work fine to get you out of there. At least this
has
>worked for me when I have been on the receiving end of most spells from
>wizard, necro and shaman type casters. Except for the damage + stun spells
>of druids and enchanters, casting continues. I suppose charm type spells
>would also be a problem. Do they use these?
>
>
